referring_expressions.00:
task_id: 157
task: Prepare for a relaxing bath.
1. Walk to the double sink in the bathroom. [sink-1]
2. Turn on the faucet to fill a cup or small container with warm water. [sink-1]
3. Go to the tall bathroom cabinet. [cabinet-5]
4. Fetch a towel from the triangular wooden stool nearby. [stool-4]
5. Walk to the small white bathtub that can be used as a jacuzzi. [bathtub-3]
6. Pour the water from the cup into the bathtub to test the temperature. [bathtub-3]
7. Adjust the water temperature at the faucet of the tub if necessary. [bathtub-3]
8. Place the towel near the bathtub. [bathtub-3]
9. Start the jacuzzi function of the bathtub. [bathtub-3]
referring_expressions.01: 在马桶正后方上方 0.5 米处的墙上安装一个毛巾架，确保其水平跨度为 0.4 米。
referring_expressions.02: 当您在浴缸中放松时，将一只直径为 0.15 米、高为 0.1 米的橡皮鸭放在您座位正前方的浴缸边缘。
referring_expressions.03: 在浴室的角落放置一个洗衣篮，位于带镜子的柜子和浴缸之间，方便收集毛巾。
referring_expressions.04: 为浴缸制作一个新的浴室垫，其完全覆盖浴缸的长度并占据浴缸宽度的一半，确保垫子直接放置在浴缸下方。
referring_expressions.05: Mount a 0.4m by 0.6m wooden shelf on the wall above the toilet, making sure it is securely fastened and level for storing toiletries.
referring_expressions.06: Directly across from the sink, place a rectangular bath mat on the floor, measuring 0.6m by 0.9m, ensuring it is centered in front of the bathtub.
referring_expressions.07: Install a hook on the back of the bathroom door to hold a bathrobe, ensuring it is placed at a comfortable height for use.
referring_expressions.08: Hang a wall clock, with a diameter of 0.3m, on the wall to the right of the cabinet, allowing it to be easily visible from all directions.
referring_expressions.09: Place a small laundry basket with a 0.4m diameter and 0.6m height next to the bathtub to store used towels and clothing, ensuring it is out of the way but easily accessible.
